EmailTemplate.description: Notify that expiration date is approaching
EmailTemplate.name: Delegated Agent Renewal Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Renewal Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message is auto-generated by the eSLA
*Please do not reply to this email*
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Primary_Licensee__c},
The Division of Professional Credential Processing records show that you are eligible to renew your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Name}.
Your credential expires on {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Expiration_Date__c}.
Renew online at https://eSLA.wi.gov.
If you have any questions then please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov if you have questions.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
